name: Numba
description:
Numba, classic match 3 with Numbers! Numba is fun, fast, challenging and will help increase your overall mental fitness!

Match 3 or more numbers to create number chains in various sequences? Sound easy, get ready to find out!

With 3 challenging game modes can you claim the title of the ultimate Numba champion in this awesome puzzler!

"Addictive, challenging and beautifully pure", Eurogamer - 9/10
"50 Must-Play iOS Games", EDGE Magazine
"make no mistake, this is one of the more impressive iPhone puzzlers available", rated 8/10 - Silver Award.
